column5: Where has Mr. Hamilton gotten too..I miss his posts. Just curious is all...if anyone knows I'd like to hear about it...he is a great guy.
He had the best reports. I have seen him on other boards.
He has been away for a while. He is active in other places still.

It constantly amazes me how easily people get their knickers in a knot on a MB and then leave never to be seen again! Sensitivity issues I guess...  People take this Internet thing WAY too seriously sometimes!    I miss Steve's reports too!
Steve finally went...... TO WORK. lol.  I know he'll see this still. haha, kidding around Steve, but not. lol.

Peter, Steve got a job where I work, have to see his ugly mug everyday  Right now he's on the tail end of a 10 day adventure up at quinte, he had amazing numbers and some good ones when I last heard; hasn't cracked the 16lb mark yet, hopefully before his trip is over.  OFC's loss and they could of had him back, oh well; drop me a pm if ya want his email or to go
how is his quest for a 7 pound bullhead
I'm always sorry to see a long-time member leave the board, for whatever reasons....  Mike
There's a new thread from superdad with a report including Steve...  They had an awesome day on Quinte.  Mike

Many reports are no longer being posted by people because of the amount of traffic this site gets.  I think people have had cases where they posted a report and then the next day 10 guys on that spot that 'learned' of the hot bite on the Internet.  Seems logical... Tony
Steve was down here in the Quinte area fishing for the past few days and he had a great time by the sounds of it.  Regards, Sam
Thanks fellas.... Found...or should say heard about him through Davids,(superdad) post. Just wanted to know how the heck he was and what he was up to.

BnB, i'm alive and doing great.....it was real nice of ya to inquire about my well being.....  i certainly think it deserves a reply.  I have been working full time in the Insurance Job I acquired before i graduated in the spring. Although it has left me less time to fish, I simply make the time available count! I'm loving working at a job that I went to school for. The job prospects in this market are incredible. Specifically I am working as a Construction and Contracting Underwriter (basically means i write policies for job projects and the companies who do them. I am able to join the inspectors at the job sites to learn more about what i'm underwriting, which is fantastic!)  As for fishing, this spring was incredible. I won some money in a few Salmon tourneys, and lucked in this summer doing the same. This fall was great for bass fishing in erie, and of course, walleye fishing at Quinte.  Although our goal of a 16lbs'er was not accomplished, myself, my father, jackson, his father, superdad.....all managed personal best walleye's.  Fishing locally has substantially improved, and i was even able to test my skills this fall at a local bass tourney on Hamilton Bay which i was lucky enough to place first in. That was a very big thing for me!  But of course, the biggest and best accomplishment i made this year was landing my dream job.....something i worked very hard for.  Hope all is well with you, your family, and the rest of the board members this holidy season. Tony, although i agree 100% with what you said, it wasn't at all the reason for my departure.  I keep my eye on this board from time to time....I'm glad to see its doing just fine.....  Steve ('n Hamilton)  oh, and CH, i've bested my personal best bullhead....i'm now up to 11.45382 lbs on the digi.
Steve,  Good to hear from you. Thank you for giving us the updateon yourself.  Congratulations of landing that dream job, and I wish you all the best for your future.   JR
Best to you, Steve.  Don't be such a stranger, 'k?
Congratulations on the job and welcome back   blyght
Welcome back Steve... nice to have you here again! Water off a ducks back makes the duck water-proof! HH
That had nothing to do with it Tony but what you say is logical  I think Steve just responded to Peter and deleted his account, doubt he is back, lol
